remark.ch: 欲修課程學生請先確定專題教師。

goal.en: By guiding students to think and develop basic knowledge and skills in creative communication topics, to let students have capability to explore and solve the problems by creative thinking and implementation so dealing with research and practical issues.
goal.ch: 透過引導學生思考，培養學生通訊專題創作之基礎知識與技能，以建立發掘問題、陳述問題、解決問題、創意思考及實作之能力，從而處理研究與實務問題。

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 Introduction of the course - description and instructions
2 Training of implementation ability - programming and related technical capacity
3 Training of implementation ability - programming and related technical capacity
4 Training of implementation ability - basic training in the fields of communications, signal processing, and networks
5 Training of implementation ability - basic training in the fields of communications, signal processing, and networks
6 Training of implementation ability - basic training in the fields of communications, signal processing, and networks
7 Research proposal - problem discussing
8 Research proposal - problem discussing
9 Implementation of the research - delivery of the results
10 Implementation of the research – delivery of the results
11 Implementation of the research - delivery of the results
12 Implementation of the research - delivery of the results
13 Implementation of the research - delivery of the results
14 Implementation of the research - delivery of the results
15 Implementation of the research - delivery of the results
16 Implementation of the research - delivery of the results
17 Report writing
18 Report writing
content.ch:
週次 內容 備註
1 專題概論講解--專題說明、專題訓練說明
2 實作能力訓練--程式與相關技術能力訓練
3 實作能力訓練--程式與相關技術能力訓練
4 實作能力訓練--通訊、訊號處理、網路之基礎能力訓練
5 實作能力訓練--通訊、訊號處理、網路之基礎能力訓練
6 實作能力訓練--通訊、訊號處理、網路之基礎能力訓練
7 專題構思--專題作品討論
8 專題構思--專題作品討論
9 專題實作--專題作品實現
10 專題實作--專題作品實現
11 專題實作--專題作品實現
12 專題實作--專題作品實現
13 專題實作--專題作品實現
14 專題實作--專題作品實現
15 專題實作--專題作品實現
16 專題實作--專題作品實現
17 專題實作報告--專題報告撰寫
18 專題實作報告--專題報告撰寫
